page.title: 19THE LOSH FAMILY _ WREAY(II)
page.content: John Losh had a weakling son and two daughters.Sarah Losh is the daughter who is best remembered as she left her mark in many ways in Wreay and its surrounding area.She spoke several languages and was widely recognised as a scholar able to converse with the most learned of men.Her work on the estate still survives in the trees and shrubs she planted to beautify it.In 1842 she designed,financed and super_ vised the building of Wreay church.She was greatly concerned about the crowded state of the church burial grounds.Consequently,she made a gift of an acre of land at Wreay which she said must be open to all denominations and all classes.This cemetery is still there and is walled and planted with ivy and flowering shrubs.She also had built a chapel designed in the Italian style.
